mapper.insert: insert into TB_REGIST ( REGIST_USER, REGIST_IMAGE1, REGIST_IMAGE2, REGIST_COMMENT, REGIST_AUTH_CHK, SELECTER_CNT, SELECTER_BADGE, VOTE_END_YN, END_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED ) values( #{REGIST_USER}, #{REGIST_IMAGE1}, #{REGIST_IMAGE2}, #{REGIST_COMMENT}, #{REGIST_AUTH_CHK}, #{SELECTER_CNT}, #{SELECTER_BADGE}, #{VOTE_END_YN}, #{END_DATE}, #{CREATED_BY}, #{CREATED}, #{UPDATED_BY}, #{UPDATED} )
mapper.select: select * from TB_REGIST where REGIST_AUTH_CHK is NULL
mapper.update: update TB_REGIST set REGIST_AUTH_CHK = #{registAuthChk} where REGIST_NO = #{registerNo}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_VOTE ( REGIST_NO, VOTE, VOTE_WHO, CREATED_BY, CREATED, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED ) values( #{registNo}, #{registVote}, #{userNo}, #{userEmail}, #{created}, #{userEmail}, #{updated} )
mapper.select: select CODE_NAME,CODE_VAL from TB_COMMON_CODE where CODE_GROUP = 'ALL' or CODE_GROUP = 'USER_AGE';
select CODE_NAME,CODE_VAL from TB_COMMON_CODE where CODE_GROUP = 'ALL' or CODE_GROUP = 'USER_GENDER';
select VOTE_WHO from TB_VOTE where REGIST_NO=#{registNo} and VOTE_WHO=#{userNo}
select REGIST_NO from TB_VOTE where REGIST_NO = #{value}
